lambe is a noun meaning "tongue" in Quen: Image:Lambe.gifLambe is also the name in Quenya of the twenty-seventh letter of the Tengwar alphabet.   In all modes this letter represents L.
The names of the letters: The additional letters  The Westron name for this letter is Alo.See Westron Tengwar

lambe is a noun meaning "tongue" in Quen: The word derives from the Primitive Quendian Sundocarme LAB.
